item.title: Client And Server
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Nope

I found out the error

I just commented out the

shutdownError(“Expected login Id 14 from client.”);

and now it works =]

Thanks for your input…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2008, 10:50:23 PM[/size][hr]Okay… Now it doesn’t even connect…

I have my server running and it says error connecting to server?

Read full topic

item.title: Client And Server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You need the remove the if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { block, your probably reading packet 14 to check for client verification in server.java, correct? … well when you read it in server.java it goes onto the next one, so it’s reading the wrong packet in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Client And Server
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

Ok well I need help on why none of my clients can connect to my server…

I just downloaded a cleaned out source and none of my client can join, it just says:

Expected login Id 14 from client

And I found that in my client.java and have mucked around with the code to try and fix it but if someone can hep me fix it, that would be nice…

public void run() { // we just accepted a new connection - handle the login stuff isActive = false; long serverSessionKey = 0, clientSessionKey = 0; serverSessionKey = ((long)(java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D) << 32) + (long)(java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D); try { fillInStream(2); if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { // Need to fix this for login... shutdownError("Expected login Id 14 from client."); disconnected = true; // True return; }

Read full topic
